description: Since the Auxilia box launched a couple of months ago, the designers working on Horus Heresy kits have been knocking it out of the park with high quality Solar Auxilia in plastic. This week we’re having a look at the Veletaris and Tactical Command, the elite backbone and close range threat to accompany your hordes […]
title: Solar Auxilia Veletaris: The Goonhammer Review

description: Over the years the Goonhammer crew have put together a vast and expansive library of painting guides. Appropriately titled “How to Paint Everything” we’ve got schemes and recipes for hundreds of models. They all, however, assume you know the difference between wet blending and glazing or what the hell “zenithal” means. Welcome to Hobby 102. This […]
title: Hobby 102: Colour Theory

description: I learned a few things at the recent Lorcana Set Championship events. One is that I absolutely do not want to sit and play Lorcana for eight hours straight, no matter how much I like the game. Another is that ultra-competitive TCGbros are likely going to ruin this wonderful game. But most importantly, that competitive […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #20 – I Got Yer Be Prepared Right Here

description: We’re in a bit of a holding pattern this week, as there weren’t too many big events and (as sometimes happens when a balance update hits) people have fallen back on some reliably brutal builds to stomp on anyone getting too clever with new ideas. That’ll all change this coming weekend because we have the US […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Grey Nice

description: We've been busy building new features and support for new games and mission modes in Tabletop Battles! Come check out all the cool new stuff we've added in the last few months.
title: What’s New in Tabletop Battles, May 2024: Linked Games, Photos, Horus Heresy, Custom Game Types, and More!

description: Tom is joined by Chris, Scrivo and Lewis to talk about Standards expected at events and of the TOs who run them. All our handy social links: https://linktr.ee/6plusplusgaming
title: That 6+++ Show Episode 88: 40k Event & TO Standards in the UK
